consent.title: Welcome!
consent.intro: This tool will help you think about your future. It asks questions about school, what you like, and what you need. At the end, you get ideas for your next steps.
consent.privacy: Your answers stay on your phone. We do not save them on a server.

report.title: Your Path Report
report.intro: Based on your answers, here are some ideas for your next steps.

pathA.title: Continue toward Grade 12
pathA.description: With the right support, you can work toward finishing your matric. This keeps more doors open for university or further study.

pathB.title: TVET College or Skills Training
pathB.description: A hands-on path where you learn practical skills. TVET colleges offer courses in many fields. You can work while you learn.

pathC.title: Dual Approach
pathC.description: Keep working on school while exploring other options like learnerships or part-time skills courses. This gives you flexibility.

report.disclaimer: This is guidance, not a final answer. Talk to a teacher, counsellor, or trusted adult about these ideas.
